第二章

课本延伸

Givenp(T=1∣C=1)=0.9p(T=1∣C=0)=0.03p(C=1)=0.001\begin{aligned} \text{Given}\quad p(T=1|C=1) &= 0.9\\ p(T=1|C=0) &= 0.03\\ p(C=1) &= 0.001\\ \end{aligned} Givenp(T=1∣C=1)p(T=1∣C=0)p(C=1)​=0.9=0.03=0.001​

havep(T=1)=p(T=1∣C=0)p(C=0)+p(T=1∣C=1)p(C=1)=0.03087p(C=0∣T=1)=p(T=1∣C=0)p(C=0)p(T=1)p(C=1∣T=1)=p(T=1∣C=1)p(C=1)p(T=1)=0.9×0.0010.03087≃0.02915\begin{aligned} \mathrm{have}\quad p(T=1) &= p(T=1|C=0)p(C=0) + p(T=1|C=1)p(C=1)\\ &= 0.03087\\ \quad p(C=0|T=1) &=\frac{p(T=1|C=0)p(C=0)}{p(T=1)}\\ \quad p(C=1|T=1) &= \frac{p(T=1|C=1)p(C=1)}{p(T=1)}\\ &= \frac{0.9\times0.001}{0.03087} \simeq 0.02915 \end{aligned} havep(T=1)p(C=0∣T=1)p(C=1∣T=1)​=p(T=1∣C=0)p(C=0)+p(T=1∣C=1)p(C=1)=0.03087=p(T=1)p(T=1∣C=0)p(C=0)​=p(T=1)p(T=1∣C=1)p(C=1)​=0.030870.9×0.001​≃0.02915​

Efron Dice

Assume values of Blue as RRR, Yellow as YYY, Green as GGG, Blue as BBB.

p(B>Y)=p(B=4,Y=3)=p(B=4)p(Y=3)=23p(G>B)=p(G=5,B=4)+p(G=5,B=0)=12+16=23p(R>G)=p(R=6,G=5)+p(R=6,G=1)+p(R=2,G=1)=16+16+13=23p(Y>R)=p(Y=3,R=2)=23p(B>Y) = p(B=4, Y=3) =p(B=4)p(Y=3) = \frac{2}{3}\\ p(G>B) = p(G=5, B=4)+p(G=5,B=0) = \frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{6} = \frac{2}{3} \\ p(R>G) = p(R=6, G=5)+p(R=6, G=1)+p(R=2, G=1) = \frac{1}{6}+\frac{1}{6}+\frac{1}{3} = \frac{2}{3}\\ p(Y>R) = p(Y=3, R=2) = \frac{2}{3} p(B>Y)=p(B=4,Y=3)=p(B=4)p(Y=3)=32​p(G>B)=p(G=5,B=4)+p(G=5,B=0)=21​+61​=32​p(R>G)=p(R=6,G=5)+p(R=6,G=1)+p(R=2,G=1)=61​+61​+31​=32​p(Y>R)=p(Y=3,R=2)=32​

一维卷积

As u\mathbf{u}u and v\mathbf{v}v are independent, we have

pu,v(u,v)=pu(u)pv(v)pu,v(u,y−u)=pu(u)pv(y−u)p_{\mathbf{u,v}}(u, v) = p_{\mathbf{u}}(u)p_{\mathbf{v}}(v)\\ p_{\mathbf{u,v}}(u, y-u) = p_{\mathbf{u}}(u)p_\mathbf{v}(y-u) pu,v​(u,v)=pu​(u)pv​(v)pu,v​(u,y−u)=pu​(u)pv​(y−u)

To get y\mathbf{y}y with u\mathbf{u}u and v\mathbf{v}v, we sum over them, which can be done through the marginal density function and integral. Therefore,

py(y)=∫pu(u)pv(y−u)dup_\mathbf{y}(y) = \int p_\mathbf{u}(u)p_\mathbf{v}(y-u)\mathrm{d}u py​(y)=∫pu​(u)pv​(y−u)du

均匀分布的均值和方差

Uniform distribution:

p(x)=1d−c,x∈(c,d)p(x) = \frac{1}{d-c}, x\in (c, d) p(x)=d−c1​,x∈(c,d)

It is normalized because

∫−∞+∞p(x)=∫−∞+∞1d−cdxx∈(c,d)=∫cd1d−cdx=d−cd−c=1\begin{aligned} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}p(x) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{d-c}\mathrm{d} x\quad x\in(c, d)\\ &=\int_c^d \frac{1}{d-c}\mathrm{d} x\\ &=\frac{d-c}{d-c} = 1 \end{aligned} ∫−∞+∞​p(x)​=∫−∞+∞​d−c1​dxx∈(c,d)=∫cd​d−c1​dx=d−cd−c​=1​

The mean of uniform distribution is $$, the variance is $$

E(x)=∫−∞+∞p(x)xdxx∈(c,d)=∫−∞+∞1d−cxdx=1d−c∫cdxdx=12(d−c)x2∣cd=c+d2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}(x) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}p(x)x\mathrm{d}x\quad x\in(c,d)\\ &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{d-c}x\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{d-c}\int_c^d x\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{2(d-c)}x^2\bigg|_c^d\\ &=\frac{c+d}{2} \end{aligned} E(x)​=∫−∞+∞​p(x)xdxx∈(c,d)=∫−∞+∞​d−c1​xdx=d−c1​∫cd​xdx=2(d−c)1​x2∣∣∣∣∣​cd​=2c+d​​

E(x2)=∫−∞+∞p(x)xdxx∈(c,d)=∫−∞+∞1d−cx2dx=1d−c∫cdx2dx=13(d−c)x3∣cd=c2+cd+d23\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}(x^2) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}p(x)x\mathrm{d}x\quad x\in(c,d)\\ &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{d-c}x^2\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{d-c}\int_c^d x^2\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{3(d-c)}x^3\bigg|_c^d\\ &=\frac{c^2+cd+d^2}{3} \end{aligned} E(x2)​=∫−∞+∞​p(x)xdxx∈(c,d)=∫−∞+∞​d−c1​x2dx=d−c1​∫cd​x2dx=3(d−c)1​x3∣∣∣∣∣​cd​=3c2+cd+d2​​

指数分布和拉普拉斯分布概率密度函数归一化

Exponential distribution:

p(x∣λ)=λexp(−λx),x≥0p(x|\lambda) = \lambda\mathrm{exp}(-\lambda x), \qquad x\geq 0 p(x∣λ)=λexp(−λx),x≥0

Therefore,

∫−∞+∞p(x∣λ)=∫−∞+∞λexp(−λx)dx,x≥0=−∫−∞+∞exp(−λx)d(−λx)=−e−λx∣0+∞=−0−(−1)=1\begin{aligned} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} p(x|\lambda) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\lambda\mathrm{exp}(-\lambda x)\mathrm{d}x,\qquad x\geq 0\\ &= -\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathrm{exp}(-\lambda x)\mathrm{d}(-\lambda x)\\ &= -e^{-\lambda x}\bigg|_0^{+\infty}\\ &= -0-(-1) = 1 \end{aligned} ∫−∞+∞​p(x∣λ)​=∫−∞+∞​λexp(−λx)dx,x≥0=−∫−∞+∞​exp(−λx)d(−λx)=−e−λx∣∣∣∣∣​0+∞​=−0−(−1)=1​

Laplace distribution:

p(x∣μ,γ)=12γexp(−∣x−μ∣γ)p(x|\mu, \gamma) = \frac{1}{2\gamma}\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{|x-\mu|}{\gamma}\right) p(x∣μ,γ)=2γ1​exp(−γ∣x−μ∣​)

Therefore,

∫−∞+∞p(x∣λ)=∫−∞+∞12γexp(−∣x−μ∣γ)dx=12γ∫−∞μexp(x−μγ)dx+12γ∫μ+∞exp(−x−μγ)dx=12γ⋅γexp(x−μγ)∣−∞μ−12γ⋅γexp(−x−μγ)∣μ+∞=12+12=1\begin{aligned} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} p(x|\lambda) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{2\gamma}\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{|x-\mu|}{\gamma}\right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{2\gamma}\int_{-\infty}^{\mu}\mathrm{exp}\left(\frac{x-\mu}{\gamma}\right)\mathrm{d}x+\frac{1}{2\gamma}\int_{\mu}^{+\infty}\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{x-\mu}{\gamma}\right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &=\frac{1}{2\gamma}\cdot \gamma\mathrm{exp}\left(\frac{x-\mu}{\gamma}\right)\bigg|_{-\infty}^{\mu} - \frac{1}{2\gamma}\cdot\gamma\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{x-\mu}{\gamma}\right)\bigg|_{\mu}^{+\infty}\\ &=\frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2} = 1 \end{aligned} ∫−∞+∞​p(x∣λ)​=∫−∞+∞​2γ1​exp(−γ∣x−μ∣​)dx=2γ1​∫−∞μ​exp(γx−μ​)dx+2γ1​∫μ+∞​exp(−γx−μ​)dx=2γ1​⋅γexp(γx−μ​)∣∣∣∣∣​−∞μ​−2γ1​⋅γexp(−γx−μ​)∣∣∣∣∣​μ+∞​=21​+21​=1​

狄拉克函数的归一化

Dirac delta function

“we can think of this as an infinitely narrow and infinitely tall spike located at x=μx=\mux=μ with the property of having unit area”

p(x∣μ)=δ(x−μ)p(x|\mu) = \delta(x-\mu) p(x∣μ)=δ(x−μ)

with a set of observations of xxx by D={x1,…,xN}\mathcal{D} = \{x_1, \dots, x_N\}D={x1​,…,xN​}, it can be represented here,

p(x∣D)=1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)p(x|\mathcal{D}) = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}\delta(x-x_n) p(x∣D)=N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​)

Therefore,

∫−∞+∞p(x)dx=∫−∞+∞1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)dx=1N∑n=1N∫−∞+∞δ(x−xn)dx=1N∑n=1N1=1\begin{aligned} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} p(x)\mathrm{d}x &=\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}\delta(x-x_n)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\delta(x-x_n)\mathrm{d}x\\ &=\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}1\\ &=1 \end{aligned} ∫−∞+∞​p(x)dx​=∫−∞+∞​N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​)dx=N1​n=1∑N​∫−∞+∞​δ(x−xn​)dx=N1​n=1∑N​1=1​

使用经验密度函数证明公式 2.40

p(x∣D)=1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)p(x|\mathcal{D}) = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}\delta(x-x_n) p(x∣D)=N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​)

E[f]=∫p(x)f(x)dx=∫(1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn))f(x)dx=1N∫∑Nn=1δ(x−xn)f(x)dx≃1N∫∑n=1Nf(xn)dx\begin{aligned} E[f] &= \int p(x)f(x)\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \int(\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}\delta(x-x_n))f(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\int\sum_N^{n=1}\delta(x-x_n)f(x)\mathrm{d}x \\ &\simeq \frac{1}{N}\int \sum_{n=1}^N f(x_n)\mathrm{d}x \\ \end{aligned} E[f]​=∫p(x)f(x)dx=∫(N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​))f(x)dx=N1​∫N∑n=1​δ(x−xn​)f(x)dx≃N1​∫n=1∑N​f(xn​)dx​

证明方差公式

var[f]=E[(f−E[f])2]=E[f2−2⋅E[f]f+E[f]2]=E[f2]−2E[f]⋅f+E[f]2=E[f]2−2E[f]2+E[f]2=E[f2]−E[f]2即var[f]=E[f(x)2]−E[f(x)]2\begin{aligned} \mathrm{var}[f] &= \mathbb{E}\left[(f-\mathbb{E}[f])^2\right]\\ &= \mathbb{E}\left[f^2-2\cdot\mathbb{E}[f]f+\mathbb{E}[f]^2\right]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[f^2]-2\mathbb{E}[f]\cdot f+\mathbb{E}[f]^2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[f]^2-2\mathbb{E}[f]^2+\mathbb{E}[f]^2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[f^2] - \mathbb{E}[f]^2\\ 即\mathrm{var}[f] &= \mathbb{E}[f(x)^2]-\mathbb{E}[f(x)]^2 \end{aligned} var[f]即var[f]​=E[(f−E[f])2]=E[f2−2⋅E[f]f+E[f]2]=E[f2]−2E[f]⋅f+E[f]2=E[f]2−2E[f]2+E[f]2=E[f2]−E[f]2=E[f(x)2]−E[f(x)]2​

两变量独立, 协方差为 0

cov[x,y]=Ex,y[{x−E[x]}{y−E[y]}]=Ex,y[xy−xE[y]−yE[x]+E[x]E[y]]=Ex,y[xy]−E[x]E[y]=E[x]E[y]−E[x]E[y]=0\begin{aligned} \mathrm{cov}[x, y] &= \mathbb{E}_{x,y}\left[\{x-\mathbb{E}[x]\}\{y-\mathbb{E}[y]\}\right]\\ &= \mathbb{E}_{x,y}[xy-x\mathbb{E}[y]-y\mathbb{E}[x]+\mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[y]] \\ &= \mathbb{E}_{x,y}[xy]-\mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[y]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[y] - \mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[y]\\ &= 0 \end{aligned} cov[x,y]​=Ex,y​[{x−E[x]}{y−E[y]}]=Ex,y​[xy−xE[y]−yE[x]+E[x]E[y]]=Ex,y​[xy]−E[x]E[y]=E[x]E[y]−E[x]E[y]=0​

两独立的随机变量, 均值与方差的加减关系

E[x+z]=∫p(x+z)(x+z)d(x,z)=∫∫p(x)p(z)xdxdz+∫∫p(x)p(z)zdxdz=∫p(z)∫p(x)xdxdz+∫p(x)∫p(z)zdzdx=∫p(z)E[x]dz+∫p(x)E[z]dx=E[x]+E[z]\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x+z] &= \int p(x+z)(x+z)\mathrm{d}(x,z)\\ &= \int\int p(x)p(z)x\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}z + \int\int p(x)p(z)z\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}z\\ &= \int p(z)\int p(x)x\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}z + \int p(x)\int p(z)z\mathrm{d}z\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int p(z)\mathbb{E}[x]\mathrm{d}z + \int p(x)\mathbb{E}[z]\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x] + \mathbb{E}[z] \end{aligned} E[x+z]​=∫p(x+z)(x+z)d(x,z)=∫∫p(x)p(z)xdxdz+∫∫p(x)p(z)zdxdz=∫p(z)∫p(x)xdxdz+∫p(x)∫p(z)zdzdx=∫p(z)E[x]dz+∫p(x)E[z]dx=E[x]+E[z]​

var[x+z]=E[{x+z−E[x+z]}2]=E[(x+z)2−2(x+z)E[x+z]+E[x+z]2]=E[x2+z2+2xz−2(x+z)E[x+z]+E[x+z]2]=E[x2+z2+2xz−2xE[x]−2zE[z]−2xE[z]−2zE[x]+E[x]2+E[z]2+2⋅E[x]E[z]]=E[x2−2⋅xE[x]+E[x]2+z2−2⋅zE[z]+E[z]2+2E[xz]+2E[x][E][z]−zE[x]−xE[z]]=E[x2−2⋅xE[x]+E[x]2+z2−2⋅zE[z]+E[z]2=E[{x−E[x]}2]+E[{z−E[z]}2]=var[x]+var[z]\begin{aligned} \mathrm{var}[x+z] &= \mathbb{E}[\{x+z-\mathbb{E}[x+z]\}^2] \\ &= \mathbb{E}[(x+z)^2-2(x+z)\mathbb{E}[x+z]+\mathbb{E}[x+z]^2]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2+z^2+2xz-2(x+z)\mathbb{E}[x+z]+\mathbb{E}[x+z]^2]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2 + z^2 + 2xz -2x\mathbb{E}[x]-2z\mathbb{E}[z]-2x\mathbb{E}[z]-2z\mathbb{E}[x] + \mathbb{E}[x]^2 + \mathbb{E}[z]^2 + 2\cdot \mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[z]]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2-2\cdot x\mathbb{E}[x] + \mathbb{E}[x]^2 + z^2-2\cdot z\mathbb{E}[z] + \mathbb{E}[z]^2 + 2\mathbb{E}[xz]+2\mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb[E][z]-z\mathbb{E}[x]-x\mathbb{E}[z]] \\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2-2\cdot x\mathbb{E}[x] + \mathbb{E}[x]^2 + z^2-2\cdot z\mathbb{E}[z] + \mathbb{E}[z]^2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[\{x-\mathbb{E}[x]\}^2] + \mathbb{E}[\{z-\mathbb{E}[z]\}^2] \\ &= \mathrm{var}[x] + \mathrm{var}[z] \end{aligned} var[x+z]​=E[{x+z−E[x+z]}2]=E[(x+z)2−2(x+z)E[x+z]+E[x+z]2]=E[x2+z2+2xz−2(x+z)E[x+z]+E[x+z]2]=E[x2+z2+2xz−2xE[x]−2zE[z]−2xE[z]−2zE[x]+E[x]2+E[z]2+2⋅E[x]E[z]]=E[x2−2⋅xE[x]+E[x]2+z2−2⋅zE[z]+E[z]2+2E[xz]+2E[x][E][z]−zE[x]−xE[z]]=E[x2−2⋅xE[x]+E[x]2+z2−2⋅zE[z]+E[z]2=E[{x−E[x]}2]+E[{z−E[z]}2]=var[x]+var[z]​

证明全期望公式与条件期望和条件方差的的分解公式

proof E[x]=Ey[Ex[x∣y]]\mathbb{E}[x] = \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]]E[x]=Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]]

Ex[x∣y]=∫xp(x∣y)dxEy[Ex[x∣y]]=∫y∫xp(x∣y)dxdy\mathbb{E}_x[x|y] = \int xp(x|y)\mathrm{d}x\\ \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]] = \int y\int xp(x|y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y Ex​[x∣y]=∫xp(x∣y)dxEy​[Ex​[x∣y]]=∫y∫xp(x∣y)dxdy

E[x]=∫xp(x)dx=∫x[∫p(x∣y)p(y)dy]dx=∫x∫p(x∣y)p(y)dydx=∫p(y)[∫xp(x∣y)dx]dy=∫p(y)Ex[x∣y]dy=Ey[Ex[x∣y]]\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x] &= \int xp(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int x\left[\int p(x|y)p(y)\mathrm{d}y\right]\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \int x\int p(x|y)p(y)\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int p(y)\left[\int xp(x|y)\mathrm{d}x\right]\mathrm{d}y\\ &= \int p(y)\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]\mathrm{d}y\\ &= \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]] \end{aligned} E[x]​=∫xp(x)dx=∫x[∫p(x∣y)p(y)dy]dx=∫x∫p(x∣y)p(y)dydx=∫p(y)[∫xp(x∣y)dx]dy=∫p(y)Ex​[x∣y]dy=Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]]​

proof var[x]=Ey[varx[x∣y]]+var[Ex[x∣y]]\mathrm{var}[x] = \mathbb{E}_y[\mathrm{var}_x[x|y]] + \mathrm{var}[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]]var[x]=Ey​[varx​[x∣y]]+var[Ex​[x∣y]]

varx[x∣y]=E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2Ey[varx[x∣y]]=Ey[E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2]\mathrm{var}_x[x|y] = \mathbb{E}[x^2|y] -\mathbb{E}[x|y]^2 \\ \mathbb{E}_y[\mathrm{var}_x[x|y]] = \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}[x^2|y] -\mathbb{E}[x|y]^2] varx​[x∣y]=E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2Ey​[varx​[x∣y]]=Ey​[E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2]

var[x∣y]=E[(x−E[x∣y])2∣y]=E[(x2−2⋅xE[x∣y]+E[x∣y]2)∣y]=E[x2∣y]−2⋅E[xE[x∣y]∣y]+E[E[x∣y]2∣y]=E[x2∣y]−2⋅E[x]E[x∣y]+E[x∣y]2\begin{aligned} \mathrm{var}[x|y] &= \mathbb{E}[(x-\mathbb{E}[x|y])^2|y] \\ &= \mathbb{E}[(x^2-2\cdot x\mathbb{E}[x|y]+\mathbb{E}[x|y]^2)|y]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2|y] -2\cdot \mathbb{E}[x\mathbb{E}[x|y]|y] + \mathbb{E}[\mathbb{E}[x|y]^2|y] \\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2|y]-2\cdot \mathbb{E}[x]\mathbb{E}[x|y] + \mathbb{E}[x|y]^2 \\ \end{aligned} var[x∣y]​=E[(x−E[x∣y])2∣y]=E[(x2−2⋅xE[x∣y]+E[x∣y]2)∣y]=E[x2∣y]−2⋅E[xE[x∣y]∣y]+E[E[x∣y]2∣y]=E[x2∣y]−2⋅E[x]E[x∣y]+E[x∣y]2​

notice that E[x∣y]\mathbb{E}[x|y]E[x∣y] with respect to yyy, therefore

var[x∣y]=E[x2∣y]−2E[x∣y]2+E[x∣y]2=E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2\begin{aligned} \mathrm{var}[x|y] &= \mathbb{E}[x^2|y] -2\mathbb{E}[x|y]^2 + \mathbb{E}[x|y]^2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2|y] - \mathbb{E}[x|y]^2 \end{aligned} var[x∣y]​=E[x2∣y]−2E[x∣y]2+E[x∣y]2=E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2​

and we proof the formula of total expectation here

Ey[Ex[x∣y]]=∫p(y)[∫p(x)p(x∣y)dx)]dy=∫p(x)[∫p(y)p(x∣y)dy]dx=∫p(x)Eydx=E[x]\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]] &= \int p(y)\left[\int p(x)p(x|y)\mathrm{d}x)\right]\mathrm{d}y\\ &= \int p(x)\left[\int p(y)p(x|y)\mathrm{d}y\right]\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int p(x) \mathbb{E}_y\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x] \end{aligned} Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]]​=∫p(y)[∫p(x)p(x∣y)dx)]dy=∫p(x)[∫p(y)p(x∣y)dy]dx=∫p(x)Ey​dx=E[x]​

hence, we have

Ey[varx[x∣y]]+vary[Ex[x∣y]]=∫p(y)(E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2)dy+Ey[x∣y]2−Ey[x∣y]2=Ey[Ex[x2∣y]]−Ey[Ex[x∣y]2]+Ey[Ex[x∣y]2]−Ey[Ex[x∣y]]2=EyEx[x2∣y]−Ey[Ex[x∣y]2]+Ey[x∣y]2−EyEx[x∣y]2=EyEx[x2∣y]−EyEx[x∣y]2=E[x2]−E[x]2=var[x]\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}_y[\mathrm{var}_x[x|y]] + \mathrm{var}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]] &= \int p(y)(\mathbb{E}[x^2|y] - \mathbb{E}[x|y]^2 )\mathrm{d}y + \mathbb{E}_y[x|y]^2 - \mathbb{E}_y[x|y]^2 \\ &= \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x^2|y]]-\mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]^2] + \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]^2] - \mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]]^2 \\ &= \mathbb{E}_y\mathbb{E}_x[x^2|y]-\mathbb{E}_y[\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]^2] + \mathbb{E}_y[x|y]^2 - \mathbb{E}_y\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]^2 \\ &= \mathbb{E}_y\mathbb{E}_x[x^2|y] - \mathbb{E}_y\mathbb{E}_x[x|y]^2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x^2] - \mathbb{E}[x]^2\\ &= \mathrm{var}[x] \end{aligned} Ey​[varx​[x∣y]]+vary​[Ex​[x∣y]]​=∫p(y)(E[x2∣y]−E[x∣y]2)dy+Ey​[x∣y]2−Ey​[x∣y]2=Ey​[Ex​[x2∣y]]−Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]2]+Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]2]−Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]]2=Ey​Ex​[x2∣y]−Ey​[Ex​[x∣y]2]+Ey​[x∣y]2−Ey​Ex​[x∣y]2=Ey​Ex​[x2∣y]−Ey​Ex​[x∣y]2=E[x2]−E[x]2=var[x]​

I2=∫−∞+∞∫−∞+∞exp(−12σ2x2−12σ2y2)dxdy=∫02π∫0+∞exp(−12σ2r2cos2θ−12σ2r2sin2θ)rdθdr=∫02π∫0+∞exp(−12σ2r2)rdθdr=−σ2exp(−12σ2r2)∣0+∞=2πσ2\begin{aligned} I^2 &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}x^2-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}y^2 \right)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y \\ &= \int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_0^{+\infty} \mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}r^2\mathrm{cos}^2\theta - \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}r^2\mathrm{sin}^2\theta \right)r\mathrm{d}\theta\mathrm{d}r\\ &= \int_{0}^{2\pi}\int_0^{+\infty} \mathrm{exp} \left(-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2 }r^2 \right) r\mathrm{d}\theta\mathrm{d}r\\ &= -\sigma^2\mathrm{exp}\left(-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2 }r^2\right)\bigg|^{+\infty}_0\\ &= 2\pi\sigma^2 \end{aligned} I2​=∫−∞+∞​∫−∞+∞​exp(−2σ21​x2−2σ21​y2)dxdy=∫02π​∫0+∞​exp(−2σ21​r2cos2θ−2σ21​r2sin2θ)rdθdr=∫02π​∫0+∞​exp(−2σ21​r2)rdθdr=−σ2exp(−2σ21​r2)∣∣∣∣∣​0+∞​=2πσ2​

∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)=∫−∞+∞12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}d(x−μ)=12πσ2⋅2πσ2=1\begin{aligned} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2) &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mathrm{d}(x-\mu) \\ &= \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\cdot \sqrt{2\pi \sigma^2}\\ &= 1 \end{aligned} ∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)​=∫−∞+∞​2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}d(x−μ)=2πσ2​1​⋅2πσ2​=1​

univariate Gaussian distribution

N(x∣μ,σ2)=12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} N(x∣μ,σ2)=2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}

Therefore,

E[x]=∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx=∫−∞+∞12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}xdx=12πσ2∫−∞+∞exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}xdx=12πσ2∫−∞+∞exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}(x−μ+μ)d(x−μ)=12πσ2∫−∞+∞exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}(x−μ)d(x−μ)+12πσ2∫−∞+∞exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}μdx=−2σπe−(x−μ)22σ2∣−∞+∞+μ2πσ2∫−∞+∞exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}d(x−μ)=0+μ×1=μ\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x] &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)x\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} x\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} x\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} (x-\mu + \mu)\mathrm{d}(x-\mu)\\ &= \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}} \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} (x-\mu)\mathrm{d}(x-\mu) + \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mu\mathrm{d}x \\ &= -\frac{\sqrt{2}\sigma}{\sqrt{\pi}}e^{\frac{-(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}}\bigg|_{-\infty}^{+\infty} + \frac{\mu}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mathrm{d}(x-\mu)\\ &= 0 + \mu \times 1 = \mu \end{aligned} E[x]​=∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx=∫−∞+∞​2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}xdx=2πσ2​1​∫−∞+∞​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}xdx=2πσ2​1​∫−∞+∞​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}(x−μ+μ)d(x−μ)=2πσ2​1​∫−∞+∞​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}(x−μ)d(x−μ)+2πσ2​1​∫−∞+∞​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}μdx=−π​2​σ​e2σ2−(x−μ)2​∣∣∣∣∣​−∞+∞​+2πσ2​μ​∫−∞+∞​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}d(x−μ)=0+μ×1=μ​

∫−∞+∞12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=1(differentiating both sides of the normalization condition)ddσ2∫−∞+∞⋯=0∫−∞+∞[1−2σ3+(x−μ)22σ5]12πexp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=0∫−∞+∞(x−μ)2−σ22σ4⋅12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=0∫−∞+∞−12σ2N(x∣μ,σ2)dx+∫−∞+∞(x−μ)22σ4N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=0∫−∞+∞(x−μ)22σ4N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=12σ2∫−∞+∞(x−μ)2N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2∫−∞+∞(x2−2μx+μ2)N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2∫−∞+∞x2N(x∣μ,σ2)dx−2μ∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx+μ2∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2E[x2]−2μE[x]+μ2×1=σ2E[x2]=μ2+σ2\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mathrm{d}x = 1\\ \text{(differentiating both sides of the normalization condition)}\\ \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}\sigma^2}\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \cdots = 0\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \left[\frac{1}{-2\sigma^3} + \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^5} \right]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mathrm{d}x = 0\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{(x-\mu)^2-\sigma^2}{2\sigma^4}\cdot\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\mathrm{d}x = 0\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} -\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x + \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^4}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x = 0\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^4}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x = \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} (x-\mu)^2\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x = \sigma^2\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} (x^2-2\mu x+\mu^2)\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x = \sigma^2\\ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} x^2\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x - 2\mu \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)x\mathrm{d}x + \mu^2\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)\mathrm{d}x = \sigma^2\\ \mathbb{E}[x^2]-2\mu\mathbb{E}[x]+\mu^2\times 1 = \sigma^2\\ \mathbb{E}[x^2] = \mu^2 + \sigma^2 ∫−∞+∞​2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=1(differentiating both sides of the normalization condition)dσ2d​∫−∞+∞​⋯=0∫−∞+∞​[−2σ31​+2σ5(x−μ)2​]2π​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=0∫−∞+∞​2σ4(x−μ)2−σ2​⋅2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=0∫−∞+∞​−2σ21​N(x∣μ,σ2)dx+∫−∞+∞​2σ4(x−μ)2​N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=0∫−∞+∞​2σ4(x−μ)2​N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=2σ21​∫−∞+∞​(x−μ)2N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2∫−∞+∞​(x2−2μx+μ2)N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2∫−∞+∞​x2N(x∣μ,σ2)dx−2μ∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx+μ2∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)dx=σ2E[x2]−2μE[x]+μ2×1=σ2E[x2]=μ2+σ2

证明多元高斯分布的众数即μ\muμ

To find the mode of the Gaussian distribution, we need to find xxx when probability density is the max. Therefore, we diff the probability density with respect to xxx, and

ddx12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}=−x−μσ2⋅12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}=μ−x2πσ3exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}\begin{aligned} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} &= -\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma^2}\cdot \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\}\\ &= \frac{\mu-x}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma^3}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\right\} \end{aligned} dxd​2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}​=−σ2x−μ​⋅2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}=2π​σ3μ−x​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}​

we want derivative to be 0. Informally, x=μx = \mux=μ

验证极大似然估计的结论

we have log likelihood function here, and we want to verify the formula of μML\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}μML​ and σML2\sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}}σML2​

lnp(x∣μ,σ2)=−12σ2∑n=1N(xn−μ)2−N2lnσ2−N2ln(2π)μML=1N∑n=1NxnσML2=1N∑n=1N(xn−μML)2\mathrm{ln}p(\mathsf{x}|\mu, \sigma^2) = -\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\sum^{N}_{n=1}(x_n-\mu)^2 - \frac{N}{2}\mathrm{ln}\sigma^2- \frac{N}{2}\mathrm{ln}(2\pi)\\ \mu_{\mathrm{ML}} = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}x_n\\ \sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}} = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}(x_n-\mu_{\mathrm{ML}})^2 lnp(x∣μ,σ2)=−2σ21​n=1∑N​(xn​−μ)2−2N​lnσ2−2N​ln(2π)μML​=N1​n=1∑N​xn​σML2​=N1​n=1∑N​(xn​−μML​)2

we set the derivatives of the log likelihood function with respect to μ\muμ

ddμlnp(x∣μ,σ2)=1σ2∑n=1N(xn−μ)=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}\mu}\mathrm{ln}p(\mathsf{x}|\mu, \sigma^2) &= \frac{1}{\sigma^2}\sum^N_{n=1}(x_n-\mu) \\ &= 0 \end{aligned} dμd​lnp(x∣μ,σ2)​=σ21​n=1∑N​(xn​−μ)=0​

hence, we have μML=1N∑n=1N\mu_{\mathrm{ML}} = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}μML​=N1​∑n=1N​

Next, we set the derivatives of the log likelihood function with respect to σ2\sigma^2σ2

ddσ2lnp(x∣μ,σ2)=12σ4∑n=1N(xn−μML)2−N2σ2=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}\sigma^2}\mathrm{ln}p(\mathsf{x}|\mu, \sigma^2) &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^4}\sum^N_{n=1}(x_n-\mu_{\mathrm{ML}})^2 - \frac{N}{2\sigma^2} \\ &= 0 \end{aligned} dσ2d​lnp(x∣μ,σ2)​=2σ41​n=1∑N​(xn​−μML​)2−2σ2N​=0​

hence, we have σML2=1N∑n=1N(xn−μML)\sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}} = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}(x_n-\mu_{\mathrm{ML}})σML2​=N1​∑n=1N​(xn​−μML​)

We have

E[x]=∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx=μE[x2]=∫−∞+∞N(x∣μ,σ2)x2dx=μ2+σ2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x] &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)x\mathrm{d}x = \mu \\ \mathbb{E}[x^2] &= \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty}\mathcal{N}(x|\mu, \sigma^2)x^2\mathrm{d}x = \mu^2+\sigma^2 \\ \end{aligned} E[x]E[x2]​=∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)xdx=μ=∫−∞+∞​N(x∣μ,σ2)x2dx=μ2+σ2​

and we wanna proof

E[μML]=μE[σML2]=(N−1N)σ2\mathbb{E}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}] = \mu\\ \mathbb{E}[\sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}}] = \left(\frac{N-1}{N}\right)\sigma^2 E[μML​]=μE[σML2​]=(NN−1​)σ2

If n=mn=mn=m, there is xn=xmx_n = x_mxn​=xm​. Hence, we have

E[xnxm]=E[xn2]=E[xn]2+var[xn]=μ2+σ2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x_nx_m] &= \mathbb{E}[x_n^2]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x_n]^2 + \mathrm{var}[x_n]\\ &= \mu^2 + \sigma^2 \end{aligned} E[xn​xm​]​=E[xn2​]=E[xn​]2+var[xn​]=μ2+σ2​

from which we can see that Inm=1I_{nm}=1Inm​=1

If n≠mn\neq mn​=m, xnx_nxn​ and xmx_mxm​ are independent. Hence, we have

E[xnxm]=E[xn]E[xm]=μ2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[x_nx_m] &= \mathbb{E}[x_n]\mathbb{E}[x_m]\\ &= \mu^2 \end{aligned} E[xn​xm​]​=E[xn​]E[xm​]=μ2​

from which we can see that Inm=0I_{nm} = 0Inm​=0

Next we wanna proof E[μML]=μ\mathbb{E}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}] = \muE[μML​]=μ and E[σML2]=(N−1N)σ2\mathbb{E}[\sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}}] = \left(\frac{N-1}{N}\right)\sigma^2E[σML2​]=(NN−1​)σ2

E[μML]=E[1N∑i=1Nxi]=1N∑i=1NE[xi]=1N⋅Nμ=μ\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}] &= \mathbb{E}\left[\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}x_i\right]\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}\mathbb{E}[x_i]\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\cdot N\mu\\ &= \mu \end{aligned} E[μML​]​=E[N1​i=1∑N​xi​]=N1​i=1∑N​E[xi​]=N1​⋅Nμ=μ​

E[σML2]=E[1N∑i=1N(xi−μML)2]=1NE[∑i=1N(xi2−2μMLxi+μML2)]=1N∑i=1NE[xi2]−21N∑i=1NE[μML⋅NμML]+E[μML2]=μ2+σ2−E[μML2]=μ2+σ2−var[μML]−E[μML]2=σ2−var[1N∑i=1Nxi]=σ2−1N2var[∑i=1Nxi]=σ2−1N2⋅Nσ2=(N−1N)σ2\begin{aligned} \mathbb{E}[\sigma^2_{\mathrm{ML}}] &= \mathbb{E}\left[\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}\left(x_i-\mu_{\mathrm{ML}} \right)^2 \right]\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i=1}^N (x_i^2 - 2\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}x_i + \mu_{\mathrm{ML}}^2) \right]\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}\mathbb{E}\left[x_i^2 \right] - 2\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}\mathbb{E}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}\cdot N\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}] + \mathbb{E}[\mu^2_\mathrm{ML}]\\ &= \mu^2 + \sigma^2 - \mathbb{E}[\mu^2_\mathrm{ML}]\\ &= \mu^2 + \sigma^2 - \mathrm{var}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}] - \mathbb{E}[\mu_{\mathrm{ML}}]^2\\ &= \sigma^2 - \mathrm{var}\left[\frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{i=1}x_i \right]\\ &= \sigma^2 - \frac{1}{N^2}\mathrm{var}\left[\sum^N_{i=1} x_i \right]\\ &= \sigma^2 - \frac{1}{N^2}\cdot N\sigma^2\\ &= \left(\frac{N-1}{N}\right)\sigma^2 \end{aligned} E[σML2​]​=E[N1​i=1∑N​(xi​−μML​)2]=N1​E[i=1∑N​(xi2​−2μML​xi​+μML2​)]=N1​i=1∑N​E[xi2​]−2N1​i=1∑N​E[μML​⋅NμML​]+E[μML2​]=μ2+σ2−E[μML2​]=μ2+σ2−var[μML​]−E[μML​]2=σ2−var[N1​i=1∑N​xi​]=σ2−N21​var[i=1∑N​xi​]=σ2−N21​⋅Nσ2=(NN−1​)σ2​

正态分布方差的无偏估计

We have

σ^2=1N∑n=1N(xn−μ)2\hat{\sigma}^2 = \frac{1}{N}\sum^N_{n=1}(x_n-\mu)^2 σ^2=N1​n=1∑N​(xn​−μ)2

拉格朗日乘子法最大化熵

We define the entropy as

H[p]=−∑ip(xi)ln⁡p(xi)\mathrm{H}[p] = -\sum_i p(x_i)\ln p(x_i) H[p]=−i∑​p(xi​)lnp(xi​)

拉格朗日乘子法（Lagrange Multiplier Method）是一种在数学优化问题中寻找多元函数在其变量受到一个或多个约束条件下的局部极值的方法。

假设我们有一个目标函数 f(x,x2,…,xn)f(x_, x_2, \dots, x_n)f(x,​x2​,…,xn​) 和多个约束条件 gi(x1,x2,…,xn)=0g_i(x_1, x_2, \dots, x_n) = 0gi​(x1​,x2​,…,xn​)=0, 我们希望找到使 fff 取得极值的点, 同时满足这些约束条件.

拉格朗日乘子法引入拉格朗日乘子 λi\lambda_iλi​ 来将约束优化问题转化为无约束优化问题. 定义拉格朗日函数 L\mathcal{L}L 为:

L(x1,…,xn,λ1,…,λn)=f(x1,…,xn)+∑i=1Nλigi(x1,…,xn)\mathcal{L}(x_1, \dots, x_n, \lambda_1, \dots, \lambda_n) = f(x_1, \dots, x_n) + \sum_{i=1}^N\lambda_ig_i(x_1, \dots, x_n) L(x1​,…,xn​,λ1​,…,λn​)=f(x1​,…,xn​)+i=1∑N​λi​gi​(x1​,…,xn​)

然后通过求解以下方程组来找到极值点

∂L∂xj=0forj=1,2,…,n∂L∂λi=0forj=1,2,…,m\frac{\partial \mathcal{L}}{\partial x_j} = 0 \quad \text{for}\quad j = 1, 2, \dots, n\\ \frac{\partial \mathcal{L}}{\partial \lambda_i} = 0 \quad \text{for}\quad j = 1, 2, \dots, m\\ ∂xj​∂L​=0forj=1,2,…,n∂λi​∂L​=0forj=1,2,…,m

本质上, 拉格朗日乘子法将一个带有约束的优化问题转化为一个无约束的优化问题，并通过求解偏导数来找到极值点。

with Lagrange multiplier, we have

H~=−∑ip(xi)ln⁡p(xi)+λ(∑ip(xi)−1)∂H~∂p(xi)=−ln⁡p(xi)−1+λ=0∂H~∂λ=∑ip(xi)−1=0\begin{aligned} \tilde{H} &= -\sum_i p(x_i)\ln p(x_i) + \lambda\left(\sum_i p(x_i) - 1 \right)\\ \frac{\partial\tilde{H}}{\partial p(x_i)} &= -\ln p(x_i) - 1 +\lambda = 0\\ \frac{\partial\tilde{H}}{\partial \lambda} &= \sum_ip(x_i)-1 = 0\\ \end{aligned} H~∂p(xi​)∂H~​∂λ∂H~​​=−i∑​p(xi​)lnp(xi​)+λ(i∑​p(xi​)−1)=−lnp(xi​)−1+λ=0=i∑​p(xi​)−1=0​

from which we get

∑p(xi)=1ln⁡p(xi)=λ−1\sum p(x_i) = 1\\ \ln p(x_i) = \lambda-1 ∑p(xi​)=1lnp(xi​)=λ−1

here we have p(xi)=eλ−1p(x_i) = e^{\lambda-1}p(xi​)=eλ−1, therefore

∑i=1Mp(xi)=Meλ−1=1\begin{aligned} \sum_{i=1}^M p(x_i) &= Me^{\lambda-1}\\ &= 1 \end{aligned} i=1∑M​p(xi​)​=Meλ−1=1​

hence, p(xi)=eλ−1=1Mp(x_i) = e^{\lambda-1} = \frac{1}{M}p(xi​)=eλ−1=M1​. Finally, we have Hmax⁡[x]=−∑i=1M1Mln⁡1M=ln⁡M\mathrm{H}_{\max}[x] = -\sum_{i=1}^M \frac{1}{M}\ln \frac{1}{M} = \ln MHmax​[x]=−∑i=1M​M1​lnM1​=lnM

琴生不等式证明熵的最大值

We have Jensen’ s inequality in form of following

f(∑i=1Mλixi)≤∑i=1Mλif(xi)f\left(\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_ix_i \right) \leq \sum_{i=1}^M \lambda_if(x_i) f(i=1∑M​λi​xi​)≤i=1∑M​λi​f(xi​)

H[x]=−∑i=1Mp(xi)ln⁡p(xi)\mathrm{H}[x] = -\sum_{i=1}^M p(x_i)\ln p(x_i) H[x]=−i=1∑M​p(xi​)lnp(xi​)

With Jensen’ s inequality as respect to function −ln⁡x-\ln x−lnx, we have

−ln⁡(∑i=1Mp(xi)p(xi))≤−∑i=1Mp(xi)ln⁡p(xi)−ln⁡∑i=1Mp2(xi)≤−H[x]H[x]≤ln⁡∑i=1Mp2(xi)\begin{aligned} -\ln\left( \sum_{i=1}^M p(x_i)p(x_i) \right) &\leq -\sum^M_{i=1} p(x_i)\ln p(x_i)\\ -\ln \sum_{i=1}^M p^2(x_i) &\leq -\mathrm{H}[x]\\ \mathrm{H}[x] &\leq \ln \sum^M_{i=1}p^2(x_i)\\ \end{aligned} −ln(i=1∑M​p(xi​)p(xi​))−lni=1∑M​p2(xi​)H[x]​≤−i=1∑M​p(xi​)lnp(xi​)≤−H[x]≤lni=1∑M​p2(xi​)​

As for ln⁡∑i=1Mp2(xi)\ln \sum_{i=1}^M p^2(x_i)ln∑i=1M​p2(xi​), we notice that p(xi)≤1p(x_i)\leq 1p(xi​)≤1

ln⁡∑i=1Mp2(xi)≤ln⁡M\begin{aligned} \ln \sum_{i=1}^M p^2(x_i) \leq \ln M \end{aligned} lni=1∑M​p2(xi​)≤lnM​

hence, we have H[x]≤ln⁡M\mathrm{H}[x]\leq\ln MH[x]≤lnM

变分法证明泛函熵最大值时为高斯分布

变分法是数学中的一种分析方法，主要研究泛函的极值问题。泛函是函数的函数，即它的输入是函数，输出是一个实数。变分法的核心问题是如何找到使得泛函取得极值的函数。

变分法的基本概念

  1. 泛函：泛函 JJJ 是一个映射，它将一个函数空间中的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 映射到一个实数 J[y]J[y]J[y]。
  2. 极值问题：寻找使得泛函 J[y]J[y]J[y] 取得极值的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x)。
  3. 欧拉-拉格朗日方程：变分法中的关键工具，用于找到使得泛函 J[y]J[y]J[y] 取得极值的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 满足的微分方程。

求解步骤

  1. 定义泛函: 首先需要明确要优化的泛函 J[y]J[y]J[y]，它是一个将函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 映射到实数的函数。泛函通常表示为一个积分形式，可能包含 y(x)y(x)y(x)​ 及其导数，例如：

J(y)=∫abL(x,y(x),y′(x))dx J(y) = \int_a^b L(x, y(x), y'(x))\mathrm{d}x J(y)=∫ab​L(x,y(x),y′(x))dx

其中 LLL 是给定函数 (拉格朗日函数), y(x)y(x)y(x) 是待求函数

  1. 设定边界条件: 确定函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 在积分区间的边界上的值, 即 y(a)y(a)y(a) 和 y(b)y(b)y(b)

  2. 应用欧拉-拉格朗日方程: 为了找到使得泛函 J[y]J[y]J[y] 取得极值的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x), 需要求解欧拉-拉格朗日方程

∂L∂y−ddx(∂L∂y′)=0 \frac{\partial L}{\partial y}-\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\left(\frac{\partial L}{\partial y'} \right) = 0 ∂y∂L​−dxd​(∂y′∂L​)=0

  1. 求解欧拉-拉格朗日方程: 通过求解欧拉-拉格朗日方程, 找到满足该方程的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x)

  2. 验证极值条件: 解出函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 后, 需要验证它是否确实使泛函 J[y]J[y]J[y] 取得极值.

  3. 应用边界条件: 将边界条件代入解出的函数 y(x)y(x)y(x) 中, 确定常数或其他参数的值

Formula 2.96 is

f(x)=−∫−∞∞p(x)ln⁡p(x)dx+λ1(∫−∞∞p(x)dx−1)+λ2(∫−∞∞xp(x)dx−μ)+λ3(∫−∞∞(x−μ)2p(x)dx−σ2)f(x) = -\int ^\infty_{-\infty}p(x) \ln p(x) \mathrm{d}x+\lambda_1\left(\int ^\infty_{-\infty} p(x)\mathrm{d}x-1 \right) + \lambda_2\left(\int ^\infty_{-\infty} xp(x)\mathrm{d}x-\mu \right) + \lambda_3\left(\int ^\infty_{-\infty} (x-\mu)^2p(x)\mathrm{d}x-\sigma^2 \right) f(x)=−∫−∞∞​p(x)lnp(x)dx+λ1​(∫−∞∞​p(x)dx−1)+λ2​(∫−∞∞​xp(x)dx−μ)+λ3​(∫−∞∞​(x−μ)2p(x)dx−σ2)

therefore, we have

在微积分中，对于含有积分的表达式进行求导时，我们通常使用莱布尼茨积分法则（Leibniz integral rule），也称为积分换元法或积分求导法则。莱布尼茨积分法则允许我们对含有参数的积分进行求导，前提是积分内的函数和积分限都依赖于该参数。

如果 F(x,μ)F(x, \mu)F(x,μ) 是一个依赖于参数 μ\muμ 的函数, 且在 μ\muμ 上是可微的, 那么对于积分

I(μ)=∫a(μ)b(μ)F(x,μ)dxI(\mu) = \int_{a(\mu)}^{b(\mu)} F(x, \mu)\mathrm{d}x I(μ)=∫a(μ)b(μ)​F(x,μ)dx

其导数为

dIdμ=∫a(μ)b(μ)∂F∂μdx+F(b(μ),μ)db(μ)dμ−F(a(μ),μ)da(μ)dμ\frac{\mathrm{d}I}{\mathrm{d}\mu} = \int _{a(\mu)}^{b(\mu)} \frac{\partial F}{\partial \mu}\mathrm{d}x + F(b(\mu), \mu)\frac{\mathrm{d}b(\mu)}{\mathrm{d}\mu}-F(a(\mu), \mu)\frac{\mathrm{d}a(\mu)}{\mathrm{d}\mu} dμdI​=∫a(μ)b(μ)​∂μ∂F​dx+F(b(μ),μ)dμdb(μ)​−F(a(μ),μ)dμda(μ)​

当积分为不定积分时 (没有上下限), a′(μ)=0,b′(μ)=0a'(\mu) = 0, b'(\mu) = 0a′(μ)=0,b′(μ)=0

例如, 对于以下函数

f(x)=12σ2∫p(x)(x−μ)2dxf(x) = \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int p(x)(x-\mu)^2\mathrm{d}x f(x)=2σ21​∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx

我们想要对这个表达式关于 μ\muμ 求导, 其中 F(x,μ)=p(x)(x−μ)2F(x, \mu) = p(x)(x-\mu)^2F(x,μ)=p(x)(x−μ)2, 所以求导结果为

∂f∂μ=12σ2∫∂∂μ(p(x)(x−μ)2)dx=12σ2∫p(x)∂∂μ((x−μ)2)dx=−1σ2∫p(x)(x−μ)dx\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial f}{\partial \mu} &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int \frac{\partial}{\partial \mu}\left(p(x)(x-\mu)^2 \right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int p(x)\frac{\partial}{\partial \mu}\left((x-\mu)^2 \right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\frac{1}{\sigma^2}\int p(x)(x-\mu)\mathrm{d}x \end{aligned} ∂μ∂f​​=2σ21​∫∂μ∂​(p(x)(x−μ)2)dx=2σ21​∫p(x)∂μ∂​((x−μ)2)dx=−σ21​∫p(x)(x−μ)dx​

∂f∂p(x)=−ln⁡p(x)−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2=0p(x)=exp{−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2}\frac{\partial f}{\partial p(x)} = -\ln p(x)-1 + \lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 = 0\\ p(x) = \mathrm{exp}\left\{-1+\lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 \right\} ∂p(x)∂f​=−lnp(x)−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2=0p(x)=exp{−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2}

here we show that the stationary point of the functional (2.96) is given by (2.97).

Similar with exercise 22,

∂f∂p(x)=−ln⁡p(x)−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2=0∂f∂λ1=∫−∞∞p(x)dx−1=0∂f∂λ2=∫−∞∞xp(x)dx−μ=0∂f∂λ3=∫−∞∞(x−μ)2p(x)dx−σ2=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial f}{\partial p(x)} &= -\ln p(x)-1 + \lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 = 0\\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial \lambda_1} &= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}p(x)\mathrm{d}x - 1 = 0\\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial \lambda_2} &= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}xp(x)\mathrm{d}x - \mu = 0\\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial \lambda_3} &= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} (x-\mu)^2p(x)\mathrm{d}x - \sigma^2 = 0 \end{aligned} ∂p(x)∂f​∂λ1​∂f​∂λ2​∂f​∂λ3​∂f​​=−lnp(x)−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2=0=∫−∞∞​p(x)dx−1=0=∫−∞∞​xp(x)dx−μ=0=∫−∞∞​(x−μ)2p(x)dx−σ2=0​

hence,

∫−∞∞exp{−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2}dx=1∫−∞∞xexp{−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2}dx=μ∫−∞∞(x−μ)2exp{−1+λ1+λ2x+λ3(x−μ)2}dx=σ2\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-1+\lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 \right\}\mathrm{d}x = 1\\ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}x\mathrm{exp}\left\{-1+\lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 \right\}\mathrm{d}x = \mu\\ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}(x-\mu)^2\mathrm{exp}\left\{-1+\lambda_1 + \lambda_2x + \lambda_3(x-\mu)^2 \right\}\mathrm{d}x = \sigma^2 ∫−∞∞​exp{−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2}dx=1∫−∞∞​xexp{−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2}dx=μ∫−∞∞​(x−μ)2exp{−1+λ1​+λ2​x+λ3​(x−μ)2}dx=σ2

计算正态分布的微分熵

We have

∫−∞∞xp(x)dx=μ∫−∞∞(x−μ)2p(x)dx=σ2\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}xp(x)\mathrm{d}x = \mu\\ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty}(x-\mu)^2p(x)\mathrm{d}x = \sigma^2 ∫−∞∞​xp(x)dx=μ∫−∞∞​(x−μ)2p(x)dx=σ2

The entropy of the univariate Gaussian is

H[x]=−∫p(x)log⁡p(x)dx=−∫12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}log⁡12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=−12πσ2∫exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}⋅{log⁡12πσ2−((x−μ)22σ2)}dx=−log⁡12πσ22πσ2∫exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx+12πσ2∫exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}(x−μ)22σ2dx=log⁡2πσ2+12=12{1+ln⁡(2πσ2)}\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[x] &= -\int p(x)\log p(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\cdot\left\{ \log\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}- \left(\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right)\right\}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\frac{\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\mathrm{d}x + \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\int \mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2}\mathrm{d}x \\ &= \log \sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2} + \frac{1}{2}\\ &= \frac{1}{2}\left\{1+\ln(2\pi\sigma^2) \right\} \end{aligned} H[x]​=−∫p(x)logp(x)dx=−∫2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}log2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=−2πσ2​1​∫exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}⋅{log2πσ2​1​−(2σ2(x−μ)2​)}dx=−2πσ2​log2πσ2​1​​∫exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx+2πσ2​1​∫exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}2σ2(x−μ)2​dx=log2πσ2​+21​=21​{1+ln(2πσ2)}​

证明两分布相同时 KL 散度最小

We have

KL(p∥q)=∫p(x)log⁡p(x)q(x)dx=∫p(x)log⁡p(x)dx−∫p(x)log⁡12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=H[x]−∫p(x){log⁡12πσ2−(x−μ)22σ2}dx=H[x]+log⁡2πσ2+12σ2∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx\begin{aligned} \mathrm{KL}(p\|q) &= \int p(x)\log \frac{p(x)}{q(x)}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int p(x)\log p(x)\mathrm{d}x - \int p(x)\log \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \mathrm{H}[x]-\int p(x)\left\{\log \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}} - \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \mathrm{H}[x] + \log\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2} + \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int p(x)(x-\mu)^2\mathrm{d}x\\ \end{aligned} KL(p∥q)​=∫p(x)logq(x)p(x)​dx=∫p(x)logp(x)dx−∫p(x)log2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=H[x]−∫p(x){log2πσ2​1​−2σ2(x−μ)2​}dx=H[x]+log2πσ2​+2σ21​∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx​

therefore,

∂KL(p∥q)∂μ=12σ2∫∂∂μ(p(x)(x−μ)2)dx=12σ2∫p(x)∂∂μ((x−μ)2)dx=−1σ2∫p(x)(x−μ)dx=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial \mathrm{KL}(p\| q)}{\partial \mu} &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int \frac{\partial}{\partial \mu}\left(p(x)(x-\mu)^2 \right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int p(x)\frac{\partial}{\partial \mu}\left((x-\mu)^2 \right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\frac{1}{\sigma^2}\int p(x)(x-\mu)\mathrm{d}x = 0\\ \end{aligned} ∂μ∂KL(p∥q)​​=2σ21​∫∂μ∂​(p(x)(x−μ)2)dx=2σ21​∫p(x)∂μ∂​((x−μ)2)dx=−σ21​∫p(x)(x−μ)dx=0​

hence, we have μ=E[x]\mu = \mathbb{E}[x]μ=E[x]. Similarly,

∂KL(p∥q)∂σ2=12σ2−12σ4∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial \mathrm{KL}(p\| q)}{\partial \sigma^2} &= \frac{1}{2\sigma^2} - \frac{1}{2\sigma^4} \int p(x)(x-\mu)^2\mathrm{d}x\\ &= 0 \end{aligned} ∂σ2∂KL(p∥q)​​=2σ21​−2σ41​∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx=0​

and we get Σ=σ2=var[x]\Sigma = \sigma^2 = \mathrm{var}[x]Σ=σ2=var[x]

计算两个高斯分布间的 KL 散度

KL(p∥q)=∫p(x)log⁡p(x)q(x)dx=∫12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}log⁡s⋅exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}σ⋅exp{−(x−m)22s2}dx=∫12πσ2exp{−(x−μ)22σ2}(log⁡sσ+(x−m)22s2−(x−μ)22σ2)dx=log⁡sσ+12s2∫p(x)(x−m)2dx−12σ2∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx=log⁡sσ+12s2(μ2+σ2−2m+m2)−12\begin{aligned} \mathrm{KL}(p\|q) &= \int p(x) \log \frac{p(x)}{q(x)}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\log \frac{s\cdot\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}}{\sigma\cdot\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-m)^2}{2s^2} \right\}}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\mathrm{exp}\left\{-\frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right\}\left(\log\frac{s}{\sigma} + \frac{(x-m)^2}{2s^2} - \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} \right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \log\frac{s}{\sigma} + \frac{1}{2s^2}\int p(x)(x-m)^2\mathrm{d}x - \frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\int p(x)(x-\mu)^2\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \log\frac{s}{\sigma} + \frac{1}{2s^2}(\mu^2+\sigma^2 - 2m+m^2) - \frac{1}{2}\\ \end{aligned} KL(p∥q)​=∫p(x)logq(x)p(x)​dx=∫2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}logσ⋅exp{−2s2(x−m)2​}s⋅exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}​dx=∫2πσ2​1​exp{−2σ2(x−μ)2​}(logσs​+2s2(x−m)2​−2σ2(x−μ)2​)dx=logσs​+2s21​∫p(x)(x−m)2dx−2σ21​∫p(x)(x−μ)2dx=logσs​+2s21​(μ2+σ2−2m+m2)−21​​

and here is the proof

联合分布的微分熵小于两个变量各自熵之和

H[x,y]−H[x]−H[y]=−∫∫p(x,y)log⁡p(x,y)dxdy+∫p(x)log⁡p(x)dx+∫p(y)log⁡p(y)dy=H[x]+H[y∣x]−H[x]−H[y]=H[y∣x]−H[y]≤0\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[x, y]-\mathrm{H}[x]-\mathrm{H}[y] &= -\int \int p(x, y)\log p(x, y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y +\int p(x)\log p(x)\mathrm{d}x + \int p(y)\log p(y)\mathrm{d}y \\ &= \mathrm{H}[x] + \mathrm{H}[y|x] - \mathrm{H}[x]-\mathrm{H}[y]\\ &= \mathrm{H}[y|x] - \mathrm{H}[y]\\ &\leq 0 \end{aligned} H[x,y]−H[x]−H[y]​=−∫∫p(x,y)logp(x,y)dxdy+∫p(x)logp(x)dx+∫p(y)logp(y)dy=H[x]+H[y∣x]−H[x]−H[y]=H[y∣x]−H[y]≤0​

therefore, we have H[x,y]≤H[x]+H[y]\mathrm{H}[x, y]\leq \mathrm{H}[x]+\mathrm{H}[y]H[x,y]≤H[x]+H[y], with equlity if, and only if , xxx and yyy are statistically independent.

熵的非奇异线性变化

连续随机变量 xxx 经过线性变换 y=Axy=Axy=Ax 后, 新的随机变量 yyy 的概率密度函数 p(y)p(y)p(y) 可以通过变量变换公式得到, 如果AAA 是一个非奇异矩阵

p(y)=p(x)∣det⁡A∣−1p(y) = p(x)|\det A|^{-1} p(y)=p(x)∣detA∣−1

重积分换元法，也称为多重积分的变量替换或坐标变换，是单变量积分中的换元积分法在多维空间中的推广。在多重积分中，换元法用于简化积分计算，特别是在处理复杂区域或复杂被积函数时。

∫∫Df(x,y)dxdy=∫∫D′f(x(u,v),y(u,v))∣∂(x,y)∂(u,v)∣dudv\int\int_D f(x, y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y = \int\int_{D'}f(x(u, v), y(u, v))\left| \frac{\partial(x, y)}{\partial (u, v)} \right| \mathrm{d}u \mathrm{d}v ∫∫D​f(x,y)dxdy=∫∫D′​f(x(u,v),y(u,v))∣∣∣∣∣​∂(u,v)∂(x,y)​∣∣∣∣∣​dudv

这里偏导求得是雅可比矩阵

H[y]=H[Ax]=−∫p(Ax)ln⁡p(Ax)dAx=−∣det⁡A∣∫p(x)∣det⁡A∣−1ln⁡p(x)∣det⁡A∣−1dx=−∣det⁡A∣∫p(x)∣det⁡A∣−1(ln⁡p(x)−ln⁡∣det⁡A∣)dx=H[x]+ln⁡∣det⁡A∣\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[\mathbf{y}] &= \mathrm{H}[\mathbf{Ax}]\\ &= -\int p(\mathbf{Ax})\ln p(\mathbf{Ax})\mathrm{d}\mathbf{Ax}\\ &= -|\det \mathbf{A}|\int p(\mathbf{x})|\det\mathbf{A}|^{-1}\ln p(\mathbf{x})|\det\mathbf{A}|^{-1}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}\\ &= -|\det \mathbf{A}|\int p(\mathbf{x})|\det \mathbf{A}|^{-1}\left(\ln p(\mathbf{x})- \ln |\det\mathbf A|\right)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \mathrm{H}[\mathbf{x}] + \ln |\det \mathbf{A}| \end{aligned} H[y]​=H[Ax]=−∫p(Ax)lnp(Ax)dAx=−∣detA∣∫p(x)∣detA∣−1lnp(x)∣detA∣−1dx=−∣detA∣∫p(x)∣detA∣−1(lnp(x)−ln∣detA∣)dx=H[x]+ln∣detA∣​

条件熵为 0 时条件概率的特点

H[y∣x]=−∑x∑yp(x,y)log⁡p(y∣x)dxdy=0\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[y|x] &= -\sum_x\sum_y p(x, y)\log p(y|x)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y = 0 \end{aligned} H[y∣x]​=−x∑​y∑​p(x,y)logp(y∣x)dxdy=0​

which means log⁡p(y∣x)=0\log p(y|x) = 0logp(y∣x)=0, therefore p(y∣x)=1p(y|x) = 1p(y∣x)=1. This indicates that for each xxx there is only one value of yyy such that p(y∣x)≠0p(y|x)\neq 0p(y∣x)​=0

保号性: 函数在某点的极限存在, 那么该函数在该点附近符号与该点极限值符号相同

Next we wanna proof in reverse. Assume that we have f′′(x)≥0f''(x)\geq 0f′′(x)≥0, we set ∀α∈[0,1]\forall \alpha\in[0, 1]∀α∈[0,1], ∀x>x0\forall x>x_0∀x>x0​,

F(x)≤F(x0)=0\begin{aligned} F(x)&\leq F(x_0)\\ &= 0 \end{aligned} F(x)​≤F(x0​)=0​

f(αx+(1−α)x0)≤αf(x)+(1−α)f(x0)f\left(\alpha x+(1-\alpha)x_0\right) \leq \alpha f(x) + (1-\alpha)f(x_0) f(αx+(1−α)x0​)≤αf(x)+(1−α)f(x0​)

归纳法证明凸函数不等式蕴含琴生不等式

Here formula 2.101 is

f(λa+(1−λ)b)≤λf(a)+(1−λ)f(b)f(\lambda a+(1-\lambda)b)\leq \lambda f(a) + (1-\lambda)f(b) f(λa+(1−λ)b)≤λf(a)+(1−λ)f(b)

it can be written into

f(λx1+(1−λ)x2)≤λf(x1)+(1−λ)f(x2)f(\lambda x_1+(1-\lambda)x_2)\leq \lambda f(x_1)+(1-\lambda)f(x_2) f(λx1​+(1−λ)x2​)≤λf(x1​)+(1−λ)f(x2​)

Formula 2.102 is Jensen’s inequality

f(∑i=1Mλixi)≤∑i=1Mλif(xi)f\left(\sum_{i=1}^M \lambda_i x_i \right)\le\sum_{i=1}^M \lambda_i f(x_i) f(i=1∑M​λi​xi​)≤i=1∑M​λi​f(xi​)

If M=2M=2M=2, assume that we have f(∑iMλixi)≤∑i=1Mλif(xi)f(\sum_i^M\lambda_i x_i)\leq\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i f(x_i)f(∑iM​λi​xi​)≤∑i=1M​λi​f(xi​), here ∑i=1Mλi=1\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i = 1∑i=1M​λi​=1. It is obvious that formular 2.101 holds for M=2M=2M=2

If M=kM=kM=k, assume that we have f(∑iMλixi)≤∑i=1Mλif(xi)f(\sum_i^M\lambda_i x_i)\leq\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i f(x_i)f(∑iM​λi​xi​)≤∑i=1M​λi​f(xi​), here ∑i=1Mλi=1\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i = 1∑i=1M​λi​=1

If M=k+1M=k+1M=k+1, assume that we have

f(∑i=1M−1λixi+λMxM)≤∑i=1Mλif(xi)f(\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i x_i + \lambda_Mx_M)\leq\sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i f(x_i) f(i=1∑M−1​λi​xi​+λM​xM​)≤i=1∑M​λi​f(xi​)

Next we assume ∑i=1M−1λixi=(1−λM)x0=(∑i=1M−1λi)x0\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i x_i = (1-\lambda_M)x_0 = \left(\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i\right) x_0∑i=1M−1​λi​xi​=(1−λM​)x0​=(∑i=1M−1​λi​)x0​, hence,

∑i=1Mλif(xi)=f(∑i=1M−1λixi+λMxM)≤(1−λM)f(x0)+λMf(xM)\begin{aligned} \sum_{i=1}^M\lambda_i f(x_i) &= f\left(\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i x_i + \lambda_Mx_M\right)\\ &\leq (1-\lambda_M)f(x_0) + \lambda_M f(x_M)\\ \end{aligned} i=1∑M​λi​f(xi​)​=f(i=1∑M−1​λi​xi​+λM​xM​)≤(1−λM​)f(x0​)+λM​f(xM​)​

and we have x0=∑i=1M−1λixi∑i=1M−1λix_0 = \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_ix_i} {\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i}x0​=∑i=1M−1​λi​∑i=1M−1​λi​xi​​. Here we assume ∑i=1M−1λi\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\lambda_i∑i=1M−1​λi​ as ttt. Therefore,

(1−λM)f(x0)+λMf(xM)=t⋅f(∑i=1M−1λixit)+λMf(xM)≤t⋅∑i=1M−1λitf(xi)+λMf(xM)=∑i=1Mλif(xi)\begin{aligned} (1-\lambda_M)f(x_0) + \lambda_M f(x_M) &= t\cdot f\left(\sum_{i=1}^{M-1} \frac{\lambda_ix_i}{t} \right) + \lambda_M f(x_M)\\ &\leq t\cdot \sum_{i=1}^{M-1}\frac{\lambda_i}{t} f(x_i) + \lambda_M f(x_M)\\ &= \sum_{i=1}^{M}\lambda_if(x_i) \end{aligned} (1−λM​)f(x0​)+λM​f(xM​)​=t⋅f(i=1∑M−1​tλi​xi​​)+λM​f(xM​)≤t⋅i=1∑M−1​tλi​​f(xi​)+λM​f(xM​)=i=1∑M​λi​f(xi​)​

hence, we show that the inequality 2.101 for convex functions implies the result 2.102

经验分布与真实分布的 KL 散度等于负对数似然函数

Formula 2.37 is

p(x∣D)=1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)p(x|\mathcal{D}) = \frac{1}{N}\sum_{n=1}^N\delta(x-x_n) p(x∣D)=N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​)

therefore,

KL(p∥q)=∫p(x)ln⁡{p(x)q(x)}dx=∫1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)ln⁡{1N∑n=1Nδ(x−xn)q(x∣θ)}=1N∑i=1Nln⁡1Nq(x∣θ)dx=−1N∑i=1Nln⁡q(x∣θ)−ln⁡N\begin{aligned} \mathrm{KL}(p\|q) &= \int p(x)\ln \left\{\frac{p(x)}{q(x)} \right\}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= \int \frac{1}{N}\sum_{n=1}^N\delta(x-x_n)\ln\left\{\frac{\frac{1}{N}\sum_{n=1}^N\delta(x-x_n)} {q(x|\theta)} \right\}\\ &= \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N\ln\frac{\frac{1}{N}} { q(x|\theta)}\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\ln q(x|\theta) - \ln N \end{aligned} KL(p∥q)​=∫p(x)ln{q(x)p(x)​}dx=∫N1​n=1∑N​δ(x−xn​)ln{q(x∣θ)N1​∑n=1N​δ(x−xn​)​}=N1​i=1∑N​lnq(x∣θ)N1​​dx=−N1​i=1∑N​lnq(x∣θ)−lnN​

证明条件熵的性质

Here formula 2.107 is

H[y∣x]=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(y∣x)dydx\mathrm{H}[y|x] = -\int \int p(x, y)\ln p(y|x)\mathrm{d}y \mathrm{d}x H[y∣x]=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(y∣x)dydx

we have

H[y∣x]+H[x]=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(y∣x)dxdy−∫p(x)ln⁡p(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x,y)p(x)dxdy−∫(∫p(x,y)dy)ln⁡p(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x,y)p(x)dxdy−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x,y)dxdy=H[x,y]\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[y|x] + \mathrm{H}[x] &= -\int\int p(x, y)\ln p(y|x)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y - \int p(x)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\int\int p(x, y)\ln \frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y - \int \left(\int p(x, y)\mathrm{d}y\right)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\int\int p(x, y)\ln \frac{p(x, y)}{p(x)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y - \int \int p(x, y)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x\\ &= -\int\int p(x, y)\ln p(x, y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\\ &= \mathrm{H}[x, y] \end{aligned} H[y∣x]+H[x]​=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(y∣x)dxdy−∫p(x)lnp(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x)p(x,y)​dxdy−∫(∫p(x,y)dy)lnp(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x)p(x,y)​dxdy−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x)dx=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x,y)dxdy=H[x,y]​

计算二元变量的各种熵

  1. H[x]\mathrm{H}[x]H[x]

    \mathrm{H}[x] &= -p(x=0)\ln p(x=0) - -p(x=1)\ln p(x=1) \

    &= -\frac{2}{3}\times\ln \frac{2}{3} - \frac{1}{3}\times\ln \frac{1}{3}\

    &= \ln 3 - \frac{2}{3}\ln2

    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{H}[y] &= -p(y=0)\ln p(y=0) - -p(y=1)\ln p(y=1)\

    &= -\frac{2}{3}\times\ln \frac{2}{3} - \frac{1}{3}\times\ln \frac{1}{3}\

    &= \ln 3 - \frac{2}{3}\ln2

    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{H}[y|x=0] &= -p(y=0|x=0)\ln p(y=0|x=0)

    • p(y=1|x=0)\ln p(y=1|x=0)\

    &= -\frac{1}{2}\ln \frac{1}{2} - \frac{1}{2}\ln \frac{1}{2}\

    &= \ln 2\

    \mathrm{H}[y|x=1] &= -p(y=0|x=1)\ln p(y=0|x=1)

    • p(y=1|x=1)\ln p(y=1|x=1)\

    &= 0\

    \mathrm{H}[y|x] &= p(x=0)\times\mathrm{H}[y|x=0] + p(x=1)\times\mathrm{H}[y|x=1]\

    &= \frac{2}{3}\ln 2

    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{H}[x|y=0] &= -p(x=0|y=0)\ln p(x=0|y=0) - p(x=1|y=0)\ln p(x=1|y=0)\

    &= 0\

    \mathrm{H}[x|y=1] &= -p(x=0|y=1)\ln p(x=0|y=1) - p(x=1|y=1)\ln p(x=1|y=1)\

    &= -\frac{1}{2}\ln \frac{1}{2} - \frac{1}{2}\ln \frac{1}{2}\

    &= \ln 2\

    \mathrm{H}[x|y] &= p(y=0)\mathrm{H}[x|y=0] + p(y=1)\mathrm{H}[x|y=1]\

    &= \frac{2}{3}\ln 2

    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{H}[x, y] &= -p(x=0, y=0)\ln p(x=0, y=0) - p(x=0, y=1)\ln p(x=0, y=1) - p(x=1, y=0)\ln p(x=1, y=0) - p(x=1, y=1)\ln p(x=1, y=1) \

    &= -\frac{1}{3}\ln \frac{1}{3} -\frac{1}{3}\ln \frac{1}{3} -\frac{1}{3}\ln \frac{1}{3}\

    &= \ln 3

    \end{aligned}

    \mathrm{I}[x, y] &= \mathrm{H}[y] - \mathrm{H}[y|x]\

    &= \ln 3 - \frac{2}{3}\ln 2 - \frac{2}{3}\ln 2\

    &= \ln 3 - \frac{4}{3}\ln2

    \end{aligned}

算术平均数

x‾=1N∑i=1Nxi\overline{x} = \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N x_i x=N1​i=1∑N​xi​

几何平均数

x‾=(∏i=1Nxi)1N\overline{x} = \left(\prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)^{\frac{1}{N}} x=(i=1∏N​xi​)N1​

Here is the Jensen’s inequality

f(∑i=1Nλixi)≤∑i=1Nλif(xi)f\left(\sum_{i=1}^N \lambda_ix_i \right)\leq \sum_{i=1}^N \lambda_i f(x_i) f(i=1∑N​λi​xi​)≤i=1∑N​λi​f(xi​)

therefore,

f((∏i=1Nxi)1N)=ln⁡(∏i=1Nxi)1N=1Nln⁡(∏i=1Nxi)=1N∑i=1Nln⁡xi≤\begin{aligned} f\left(\left(\prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)^{\frac{1}{N}} \right) &= \ln \left(\prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)^{\frac{1}{N}}\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\ln \left(\prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)\\ &= \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N\ln x_i\\ &\leq \end{aligned} f⎝⎜⎛​(i=1∏N​xi​)N1​⎠⎟⎞​​=ln(i=1∏N​xi​)N1​=N1​ln(i=1∏N​xi​)=N1​i=1∑N​lnxi​≤​

Since f(x)=ln⁡xf(x)=\ln xf(x)=lnx is a concave function, we have

f(1N∑i=1Nxi)≥1N∑i=1Nf(xi)ln⁡(1N∑i=1Nxi)≥1N∑i=1Nln⁡xi=1N(ln⁡∏i=1Nxi)\begin{aligned} f\left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N x_i \right) &\geq \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N f(x_i)\\ \ln \left(\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N x_i \right) &\geq \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N \ln x_i = \frac{1}{N}\left(\ln \prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)\\ \end{aligned} f(N1​i=1∑N​xi​)ln(N1​i=1∑N​xi​)​≥N1​i=1∑N​f(xi​)≥N1​i=1∑N​lnxi​=N1​(lni=1∏N​xi​)​

As f(x)=ln⁡xf(x)=\ln xf(x)=lnx and g(x)=xg(x)=xg(x)=x are monotonically increasing function, we have

1N∑i=1Nxi≥(∏i=1Nxi)1N\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N x_i\geq \left(\prod_{i=1}^N x_i\right)^{\frac{1}{N}} N1​i=1∑N​xi​≥(i=1∏N​xi​)N1​

证明互信息的公式

I[x,y]=H[x]−H[x∣y]=−∫p(x)ln⁡p(x)dx−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x∣y)dxdy=−∫(∫p(x,y)dy)ln⁡p(x)dx−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x∣y)dxdy=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x)dxdy−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡p(x,y)p(y)dxdy=−∫∫p(x,y)ln⁡(p(x)p(y)p(x,y))dxdy\begin{aligned} \mathrm{I}[x, y] &= \mathrm{H}[x] - \mathrm{H}[x|y]\\ &= -\int p(x)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x - \int\int p(x, y)\ln p(x|y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\\ &= -\int \left(\int p(x, y)\mathrm{d}y \right)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x - \int\int p(x, y)\ln p(x|y)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\\ &= -\int \int p(x, y)\ln p(x)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y - \int\int p(x, y)\ln \frac{p(x,y)}{p(y)}\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y\\ &= -\int\int p(x, y)\ln \left(\frac{p(x)p(y)}{p(x, y)} \right)\mathrm{d}x\mathrm{d}y \end{aligned} I[x,y]​=H[x]−H[x∣y]=−∫p(x)lnp(x)dx−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x∣y)dxdy=−∫(∫p(x,y)dy)lnp(x)dx−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x∣y)dxdy=−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(x)dxdy−∫∫p(x,y)lnp(y)p(x,y)​dxdy=−∫∫p(x,y)ln(p(x,y)p(x)p(y)​)dxdy​

独立是两变量不相关的充分条件, 不相关不是独立的充分条件

协方差矩阵, 用以描述一组随机变量间的线性关系. 协方差矩阵是对称矩阵, 每个元素表示两个随机变量间的协方差. 协方差的计算公式为

σij=Cov(xi,xj)=E[(xi−μi)(xj−μj)]\sigma_{ij} = \mathrm{Cov}(x_i, x_j) = \mathbb{E}[(x_i-\mu_i)(x_j-\mu_j)] σij​=Cov(xi​,xj​)=E[(xi​−μi​)(xj​−μj​)]

Assume i≠ji\neq ji​=j,

σij=E[(xi−μi)(xj−μj)]=E[xixj−μixj−μjxi+μiμj]=E[xixj]−μiE[xj]−μjE[xi]+μiμj=μiμj−μiμj−μiμj+μiμj=0\begin{aligned} \sigma_{ij} &= \mathbb{E}[(x_i-\mu_i)(x_j-\mu_j)]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x_ix_j-\mu_ix_j-\mu_jx_i+\mu_i\mu_j]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[x_ix_j] - \mu_i\mathbb{E}[x_j] - \mu_j\mathbb{E}[x_i] + \mu_i\mu_j\\ &= \mu_i\mu_j-\mu_i\mu_j-\mu_i\mu_j+\mu_i\mu_j\\ &= 0 \end{aligned} σij​​=E[(xi​−μi​)(xj​−μj​)]=E[xi​xj​−μi​xj​−μj​xi​+μi​μj​]=E[xi​xj​]−μi​E[xj​]−μj​E[xi​]+μi​μj​=μi​μj​−μi​μj​−μi​μj​+μi​μj​=0​

therefore, the covariance matrix is either a diagonal matrix or a zero matrix.

Next, we assume y1=yy_1 = yy1​=y

p(y2∣y1)=p(y12∣y1)\begin{aligned} p(y_2|y_1) &= p(y_1^2|y_1) \end{aligned} p(y2​∣y1​)​=p(y12​∣y1​)​

Obviously, it is dependent on y1y_1y1​. y1y_1y1​ and y2y_2y2​ are not independent. We have E[y1]=0\mathbb{E}[y_1]=0E[y1​]=0, E[y2]=0\mathbb{E}[y_2] = 0E[y2​]=0

σ=E[(y1−μ1)(y2−μ2)]=E[y1y2−μ1y2−μ2y1+μ1μ2]=E[y1y2]−μ1E[y2]−μ2E[y1]+μ1μ2=E[y13]=0\begin{aligned} \sigma &= \mathbb{E}[(y_1-\mu_1)(y_2-\mu_2)]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[y_1y_2-\mu_1y_2-\mu_2y_1+\mu_1\mu_2]\\ &= \mathbb{E}[y_1y_2] - \mu_1\mathbb{E}[y_2] - \mu_2\mathbb{E}[y_1] + \mu_1\mu_2\\ &= \mathbb{E}[y_1^3]\\ &= 0 \end{aligned} σ​=E[(y1​−μ1​)(y2​−μ2​)]=E[y1​y2​−μ1​y2​−μ2​y1​+μ1​μ2​]=E[y1​y2​]−μ1​E[y2​]−μ2​E[y1​]+μ1​μ2​=E[y13​]=0​

therefore, the covariance matrix is either a diagonal matrix or a zero matrix.

贝叶斯定理证明硬币例题

Bayes’ theorem

p(w∣D)=p(D∣w)p(w)p(D)p(\mathbf{w}|\mathcal{D}) = \frac{p(\mathcal{D}|\mathbf{w})p(\mathbf{w})}{p(\mathcal{D})} p(w∣D)=p(D)p(D∣w)p(w)​

We denote AAA as the convex side of the coin being heads, here p(A)=0.1p(A)=0.1p(A)=0.1, BBB as the oppsite, DDD as the fact, p0=0.8p_0=0.8p0​=0.8 as the probability of heads after flipping, p1=0.2p_1=0.2p1​=0.2 as the oppsite. We wanna know p(B∣D)p(B|D)p(B∣D)

p(B∣D)=p(D∣B)p(B)p(D)=p(D∣B)p(B)p(D∣B)p(B)+p(D∣A)p(A)\begin{aligned} p(B|D) &= \frac{p(D|B)p(B)}{p(D)}\\ &= \frac{p(D|B)p(B)}{p(D|B)p(B) + p(D|A)p(A)} \end{aligned} p(B∣D)​=p(D)p(D∣B)p(B)​=p(D∣B)p(B)+p(D∣A)p(A)p(D∣B)p(B)​​

we have

p(D∣A)=p08×p12p(D∣B)=p18×p02p(D|A) = p_0^8 \times p_1^2\\ p(D|B) = p_1^8 \times p_0^2 p(D∣A)=p08​×p12​p(D∣B)=p18​×p02​

hence,

p(B∣D)=p18×p02×0.9p18×p02×0.9+p08×p12×0.1=0.000001474560.00000147456+0.00067108864=0.000001474560.0006725632≈0.002192\begin{aligned} p(B|D) &= \frac{p_1^8 \times p_0^2 \times 0.9}{p_1^8 \times p_0^2\times 0.9 + p_0^8 \times p_1^2\times 0.1}\\ &= \frac{0.00000147456}{0.00000147456 + 0.00067108864} = \frac{0.00000147456}{0.0006725632}\\ &\approx 0.002192\\ \end{aligned} p(B∣D)​=p18​×p02​×0.9+p08​×p12​×0.1p18​×p02​×0.9​=0.00000147456+0.000671088640.00000147456​=0.00067256320.00000147456​≈0.002192​

therefore, the posterior probability of coin heading up is 0.0021920.0021920.002192.

Similarly, we get p(A∣D)=0.997808p(A|D) = 0.997808p(A∣D)=0.997808. Finally,

p=p0p(A∣D)+p1p(B∣D)=0.8×0.997808+0.2×0.002192=0.7982464+0.0004384=0.7986848≈0.7987\begin{aligned} p &= p_0p(A|D) + p_1p(B|D)\\ &= 0.8\times 0.997808 + 0.2\times 0.002192\\ &= 0.7982464 + 0.0004384\\ &= 0.7986848\\ &\approx 0.7987 \end{aligned} p​=p0​p(A∣D)+p1​p(B∣D)=0.8×0.997808+0.2×0.002192=0.7982464+0.0004384=0.7986848≈0.7987​

the probability that the next flip will land heads up is 0.79870.79870.7987

推导正则化误差函数的结果

Formula 2.114 is

−ln⁡p(w∣D)=−ln⁡p(D∣w)−ln⁡p(w)+ln⁡p(D)-\ln p(\mathbf{w}|\mathcal{D}) = -\ln p(\mathcal{D}|\mathbf{w}) - \ln p(\mathbf{w}) + \ln p(\mathcal{D}) −lnp(w∣D)=−lnp(D∣w)−lnp(w)+lnp(D)

Formula 2.115 is

p(w∣s)=∏i=0MN(wi∣0,s2)=∏i=0M(12πs2)12exp⁡{−wi22s2}p(\mathbf{w}|s) = \prod_{i=0}^M\mathcal{N}(w_i|0, s^2) = \prod_{i=0}^{M}\left(\frac{1}{2\pi s^2} \right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\exp \left\{-\frac{w_i^2}{2s^2} \right\} p(w∣s)=i=0∏M​N(wi​∣0,s2)=i=0∏M​(2πs21​)21​exp{−2s2wi2​​}

在贝叶斯统计中，$$\ln⁡ p(\mathcal{D})$$ 表示数据 D\mathcal{D}D 的对数边缘概率（或对数边缘似然）。这个量通常被称为证据（evidence），并且在给定模型的情况下，它是一个关于数据的常数。具体来说，ln⁡p(D)\ln p(\mathcal{D})lnp(D) 是模型参数 w\mathbf{w}w 的所有可能值的似然 p(D∣w)p(\mathcal{D}|\mathbf{w})p(D∣w) 的积分（或求和）的对数：

ln⁡⁡p(D)=ln⁡⁡∫p(D∣w)p(w)dw\ln ⁡p(\mathcal{D})=\ln⁡\int p(\mathcal{D}∣\mathbf{w})p(\mathbf{w})\mathrm{d}\mathbf{w} ln⁡p(D)=ln⁡∫p(D∣w)p(w)dw

在实际应用中，计算这个积分通常是非常困难的，因为它涉及到对所有可能的参数值进行积分。因此，ln⁡p(D)\ln p(\mathcal{D})lnp(D) 通常被视为一个常数项，特别是在参数估计和模型比较中，因为它不依赖于特定的参数值 w\mathbf{w}w。

在模型比较（例如，贝叶斯因子计算）或模型选择中，ln⁡p(D)\ln p(\mathcal{D})lnp(D) 的值是重要的，因为它可以帮助我们确定哪个模型更好地解释了数据。然而，在给定模型的情况下， ln⁡p(D)\ln p(\mathcal{D})lnp(D)通常被忽略，因为它在优化或推断过程中是一个不依赖于参数的常数项。

因此，ln⁡p(D)\ln p(\mathcal{D})lnp(D) 可以被简化为一个常数项，记为 CCC，在推导和优化过程中通常会被省略。

here, we ignore the constant terms that do not depend on www and get

证明多元高斯分布的众数与众数相同

Formula 3.26 is

N(x∣μ,Σ)=1(2π)D21∣Σ∣12exp⁡{−12(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)}\mathcal{N}(\mathbf{x}|\mu, \Sigma) = \frac{1}{(2\pi)^{\frac{D}{2}}}\frac{1}{|\Sigma|^{\frac{1}{2}}}\exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^{\mathrm{T}}\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) \right\} N(x∣μ,Σ)=(2π)2D​1​∣Σ∣21​1​exp{−21​(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)}

To find the mode, we need to maximize the probability density function. Due to the monotonicity of the exponential function, we can equivalently minimize the quadratic form

(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^{\mathrm{T}}\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) (x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)

here we denote x−μ\mathbf{x}-\mux−μ as y\mathbf{y}y, therefore,

ddy=(yTΣ−1y)=2Σ−1y=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}\mathbf{y}} &= (\mathbf{y}^{\mathrm{T}}\Sigma^{-1}\mathbf{y}) = 2\Sigma^{-1}\mathbf{y} = 0 \end{aligned} dyd​​=(yTΣ−1y)=2Σ−1y=0​

here we have y=0\mathbf{y} = 0y=0. Hence, x=μ\mathbf{x} = \mux=μ, the mode of the multivariate Gaussian is μ\muμ

多元高斯分布线性变换后的变量也是高斯分布

We have

N(x∣μ,Σ)=1(2π)D21∣Σ∣12exp⁡{−12(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)}\mathcal{N}(\mathbf{x}|\mu, \Sigma) = \frac{1}{(2\pi)^{\frac{D}{2}}}\frac{1}{|\Sigma|^{\frac{1}{2}}}\exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^{\mathrm{T}}\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) \right\} N(x∣μ,Σ)=(2π)2D​1​∣Σ∣21​1​exp{−21​(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)}

as A\mathbf{A}A and x\mathbf{x}x are independent, for any expectation and variance, we have

E[Ax]=E[A]×E[x]+b=A×E[x]+b=Aμ+bvar[Ax]=Avar[x]AT=AΣAT\mathbb{E}[\mathbf{Ax}] = \mathbb{E}[\mathbf{A}]\times \mathbb{E}[\mathbf{x}] + \mathbf{b} = \mathbf{A} \times \mathbb{E}[\mathbf{x}] + \mathbf{b} = \mathbf{A\mu} + \mathbf{b}\\ \mathrm{var}[\mathbf{Ax}] = \mathbf{A}\mathrm{var}[\mathbf{x}]\mathbf{A}^{\mathrm{T}} = \mathbf{A}\Sigma\mathbf{A}^{\mathrm{T}} E[Ax]=E[A]×E[x]+b=A×E[x]+b=Aμ+bvar[Ax]=Avar[x]AT=AΣAT

给定协方差, 高斯分布有最大熵

As asked, we have the Lagrange function

\mathcal{L}[p(\mathbf{x})] = -H(\mathbf{x}) + \lambda\left(\int p(\mathbf{x})\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x} -1 \right) + \mu^T\left(\int p(\mathbf{x}\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}-\mu\right) + \Tr\left[\Lambda\left(\int p(\mathbf{x})(\mathbf{x} - \mu)(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}-\Sigma \right) \right]

next we wanna perform the variational maximization

δL[p(x)]δp(x)=∫δp(x)[−ln⁡p(x)−1+λ+αT(x−μ)+(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)]dx=0\begin{aligned} \frac{\delta\mathcal{L}[p(x)]}{\delta p(x)} &= \int \delta p(\mathbf{x})[-\ln p(\mathbf{x})-1+\lambda+\alpha^T(\mathbf{x}-\mu)+(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Lambda(\mathbf{x}-\mu)]\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x} = 0 \end{aligned} δp(x)δL[p(x)]​​=∫δp(x)[−lnp(x)−1+λ+αT(x−μ)+(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)]dx=0​

hence,

p(x)=exp⁡(−1+λ+αT(x−μ)+(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ))=1(2π)d2∣Σ∣12exp⁡(−12(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))\begin{aligned} p(\mathbf{x}) &= \exp\left(-1+\lambda+\alpha^T(\mathbf{x}-\mu)+(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Lambda(\mathbf{x}-\mu)\right)\\ &= \frac{1}{(2\pi)^{\frac{d}{2}}|\Sigma|^{\frac{1}{2}}}\exp\left(-\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) \right) \end{aligned} p(x)​=exp(−1+λ+αT(x−μ)+(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ))=(2π)2d​∣Σ∣21​1​exp(−21​(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))​

证明多元高斯分布的熵

H[x]=−∫p(x)ln⁡p(x)dx=−∫p(x)(−D2ln⁡2π−12ln⁡Σ−12(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))dx=(D2ln⁡2π+12ln⁡Σ)∫p(x)dx+12∫p(x)(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)dx=D2ln⁡2π+12ln⁡Σ+D2=12ln⁡∣Σ∣+D2(1+ln⁡(2π))\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[\mathbf{x}] &= -\int p(\mathbf{x})\ln p(\mathbf{x})\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}\\ &=-\int p(\mathbf{x})\left(-\frac{D}{2}\ln 2\pi - \frac{1}{2}\ln\Sigma -\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) \right)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}\\ &= \left(\frac{D}{2}\ln 2\pi + \frac{1}{2}\ln\Sigma\right)\int p(\mathbf{x})\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x} + \frac{1}{2}\int p(\mathbf{x})(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}\\ &= \frac{D}{2}\ln 2\pi + \frac{1}{2}\ln\Sigma + \frac{D}{2}\\ &= \frac{1}{2}\ln |\Sigma| + \frac{D}{2}(1+\ln(2\pi)) \end{aligned} H[x]​=−∫p(x)lnp(x)dx=−∫p(x)(−2D​ln2π−21​lnΣ−21​(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))dx=(2D​ln2π+21​lnΣ)∫p(x)dx+21​∫p(x)(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ)dx=2D​ln2π+21​lnΣ+2D​=21​ln∣Σ∣+2D​(1+ln(2π))​

多元高斯分布中, exp⁡{(x−μ)T(x−μ)}=Σ\exp\left\{(x-\mu)^T(x-\mu) \right\} = \Sigmaexp{(x−μ)T(x−μ)}=Σ, 迹运算\Tr(\Sigma\Sigma^{-1})=\Tr(I)=D

推导两高斯分布和的微分熵表达式

卷积, 可以记为 p(x)=p1(x)∗p2(x)p(x)=p_1(x)*p_2(x)p(x)=p1​(x)∗p2​(x)

p(x)=∫−∞∞p1(x−x2)p2(x2)dx2p(x) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} p_1(x-x_2)p_2(x_2)\mathrm{d}x_2 p(x)=∫−∞∞​p1​(x−x2​)p2​(x2​)dx2​

Here we denote p(x∣x2)p(\mathbf{x|\mathbf{x}_2})p(x∣x2​) as p(x1)=p(x−x2)p(\mathbf{x}_1) = p(\mathbf{x}-\mathbf{x_2})p(x1​)=p(x−x2​). Therefore, we have p(x)=p(x1)∗p(x2)p(\mathbf{x})=p(\mathbf{x}_1)*p(\mathbf{x}_2)p(x)=p(x1​)∗p(x2​), here * denote the convolution.

Precision is the reciprocal of variance, hence

Σ=1τ1+1τ2τx=τ1τ2τ1+τ2\Sigma = \frac{1}{\tau_1} + \frac{1}{\tau_2}\\ \tau_x = \frac{\tau_1\tau_2}{\tau_1+\tau_2} Σ=τ1​1​+τ2​1​τx​=τ1​+τ2​τ1​τ2​​

next we get

p(x)=τ2πexp⁡(−τx2(x−μx)2)p(\mathbf{x}) = \sqrt{\frac{\tau}{2\pi}}\exp\left(-\frac{\tau_x}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu_x)^2 \right) p(x)=2πτ​​exp(−2τx​​(x−μx​)2)

The differencetial entropy of the Gaussian is

H[x]=12{1+ln⁡(2πσ2)}=12{1+ln⁡2πτx}\begin{aligned} \mathrm{H}[\mathbf{x}] &= \frac{1}{2}\left\{1+\ln(2\pi\sigma^2) \right\}\\ &= \frac{1}{2}\left\{1+\ln\frac{2\pi}{\tau_x} \right\} \end{aligned} H[x]​=21​{1+ln(2πσ2)}=21​{1+lnτx​2π​}​

hence,

H[x]=12{1+ln⁡2π(τ1+τ2)τ1τ2}\mathrm{H}[\mathbf{x}] = \frac{1}{2}\left\{1+\ln\frac{2\pi(\tau_1+\tau_2)}{\tau_1\tau_2} \right\} H[x]=21​{1+lnτ1​τ2​2π(τ1​+τ2​)​}

证明反对称项不会出现在高斯分布公式的指数部分

Here we denote Λ=Σ−1\Lambda = \Sigma^{-1}Λ=Σ−1. Considering

p(x)=1(2π)d2∣Σ∣12exp⁡(−12(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))p(\mathbf{x}) = \frac{1}{(2\pi)^{\frac{d}{2}}|\Sigma|^{\frac{1}{2}}}\exp \left(-\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu) \right) p(x)=(2π)2d​∣Σ∣21​1​exp(−21​(x−μ)TΣ−1(x−μ))

And we denote SSS as symmetric matrix, AAA as asymmetric matrix, therefore

任意 nnn 阶方阵都可以表示为一个对称矩阵和一个反对称矩阵的和. 比如矩阵 AAA, 构造 A1=A+AT2A_1 = \frac{A+A^T}{2}A1​=2A+AT​, A2=A−AT2A_2 = \frac{A - A^T}{2}A2​=2A−AT​, A=A1+A2A = A_1 +A_2A=A1​+A2​

对称矩阵symmetric matrix, 非对称矩阵asymmetric matrix

Λ=S+A\Lambda = S+A Λ=S+A

next we have

(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)=(x−μ)TS(x−μ)+(x−μ)TA(x−μ)(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Lambda(\mathbf{x}-\mu) = (\mathbf{x}-\mu)^TS(\mathbf{x}-\mu) + (\mathbf{x}-\mu)^TA(\mathbf{x}-\mu) (x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)=(x−μ)TS(x−μ)+(x−μ)TA(x−μ)

As AAA is asymmetric matrix, we have AT=−AA^T = -AAT=−A. Thus

(x−μ)TA(x−μ)=0(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^TA(\mathbf{x}-\mu) = 0 (x−μ)TA(x−μ)=0

we get (x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)=(x−μ)TS(x−μ)(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^T\Lambda(\mathbf{x}-\mu) = (\mathbf{x}-\mu)^TS(\mathbf{x}-\mu)(x−μ)TΛ(x−μ)=(x−μ)TS(x−μ). Hence, the precision matrix and the covariance matrix may be taken to be symmetric without loss of generality.
